bit refers to the number of bits for each feature

Stateful - 1 LUT 
Adam (0.001)
    4-bit: 0.4971981346607208
    6-bit: 0.5109681487083435
    8-bit: 0.5109788179397583
    16-bit: 0.5176224112510681
    32-bit: 0.508141279220581

Stateless - 5 LUT 
Adam (0.001)
    4-bit: 0.9642213582992554
    6-bit: 0.964626669883728
    8-bit: 0.9669350385665894
    16-bit: 0.9643539190292358
    32-bit: 0.9654213190078735

ALL - 7 LUT 
Adam (0.001)
    4-bit: 0.8188640475273132
    6-bit: 0.9126983284950256
    8-bit: 0.9645462036132812
    16-bit: 0.9633903503417969 
    32-bit:0.9626522064208984
